Create New I/O Server Dialog Box

Requires: DSC Module or Real-Time Module (Windows)

Right-click a process and select Add I/O Server from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box. Use this dialog box to create an I/O server.

(DSC Module) You can create on input change I/O servers, periodic I/O servers, data set marking I/O servers, Modbus I/O servers, Modbus Slave I/O servers, Alarm Printer I/O servers, EPICS Client I/O servers, EPICS Server I/O servers, and OPC Client I/O servers.

(Real-Time Module) You can create Modbus I/O servers, Modbus Slave I/O servers, EPICS Server I/O servers, and EPICS Client I/O servers.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • I/O Server Type—Contains a list of I/O servers you can create.
  • Description—Displays a description of the I/O server you select from the I/O Server Type list.
  • Continue—Displays the Configuration dialog box for the selected I/O server.
